sentences.sContent: We need to assess the impact on climate change.
sentences.sCn: 我们需要评估对气候变化的影响。

sentences.sContent: The force of the impact knocked the breath out of her.
sentences.sCn: 撞击力使她喘不过气来。

sentences.sContent: ...it will have an impact on diabetes and heart disease and high blood pressure...
...we expect this will have a huge impact on obesity...
...I recently tried to estimate this impact in terms of a most famous food...
...the Internet's tremendous impact has only just begun...
...Food sold as fund-raisers can also have an impact on school lunch...
...it will impact and influence people’s family affection and friendship...
...which naturally leads us to be associated with the impact of the Internet on the way people communicate...
...The impact of the Internet on the way people communicateAs to this picture above...
...I don't mean to imply that overall job growth doesn't have an impact on one's ability to land a job...
...But there are also other areas of impact that researchers have investigated: the effect of sugar on the brain and how liquid calories are interpreted differently by the body than solids...
...But chances are it won’t have much impact on the human tendency to resolve to get to the gym more and avoid chocolate cake when the clock strikes midnight on December 31...
...The impact of a salary cut is probably less severe for a scientist in the early stages of a career...
...fathers may have more impact on a child’s language development than mothers...

exam.question: Professor Taylor’s talk has indicated that science has a very strong _______ on the everyday life of non-scientists as well as scientists.

answer.explain: have an impact on： 对…有影响。句意：  泰勒教授的讲话表明， 科学对科学家及科研领域之外的人的日常生活具有极大的影响。motivation： 动机； perspective： 前景； impression： 印象。

synos.tran: 影响；效果；[物]碰撞；[力]冲击力

phrases.pCn: 对于…有影响；对…造成冲击
视觉冲击，视觉震撼；视觉效果

remMethod.val: 电影《天地大冲撞》就是Deep Impact

words.tran: 压紧的；结实的；嵌入的；（人口）稠密的

trans.tranOther: the effect or influence that an event, situation etc has on someone or something
